lines.text: Nikki? What on Earth is wrong?
Mom we can't move to New York! We can't! There was a thing on the news just now about a woman in Manhattan who got attacked by a guy in a nun's suit!
Who CARES why he did it?
"Passionately yours". That's the way Rob Lowe signs all his letters in Sixteen Magazine.
If their date is half as good as these cookies, we'll be sisters in no time!

[Surveying the vast expanse of open water surrounding the boat]
Oh... my... gosh!
[Bill and Sharon both start chuckling before kissing passionately]
